channel.title: pytorch on Maya Josyula
channel.description: Recent content in pytorch on Maya Josyula

item.title: Attempt to run fast.ai notebooks locally
item.description: These are some notes from my attempt to install fastai and fastbook locally and run the Jupyter notebooks from the fast.ai course using my laptop, instead of using a service like Paperspace Gradient or Google Colab. It didn’t completely work, so I might try again later. Summary It is possible to install fastai on Windows 10. It is possible to get PyTorch to recognize the GPU on a laptop. A 2GB GPU does not appear to be enough memory to run fast.
